snippet: A home-grown food trend is taking hold and helping restaurants that cater to a new appetite for patriotism. See how three businesses in Moscow started and thrived despite sanctions.
lead_paragraph: A home-grown food trend is taking hold and helping restaurants that cater to a new appetite for patriotism. See how three businesses in Moscow started and thrived despite sanctions.

headline.main: Video Feature: Appetite for Patriotism Is Transforming Moscow’s Restaurant Culture
